name: Bank Danych Lokalnych: GUS
description: Bank Danych Lokalnych is Poland's largest database of the economy, society and the environment. It offers data and indicators describing statistical localities, municipalities, counties, voivodships and Poland, as well as units compatible with NUTS nomenclature: macro-regions, regions and subregions. Data are available for various administrative and statistical territorial units and cover 31 thematic areas, including socio-economic and environmental topics. Data are available in long time series, since 1995.
